attributes.review: To all my fellow Republicans, please do not download this app. My phone has not worked properly ever since I downloaded this app. The battery dies after one hour of use and I cannot use any app. Do not download, there are other ways to support our beloved president.✨❤️
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.review: this app is not safe for my security or your security do not download please spread the word it ddoses you’re device and WiFi then releases addresses and more information to company’s and anybody that has there money or ways to access that info
attributes.title: security warning⚠︎︎⚠︎︎⚠︎︎

attributes.review: This app is the worst, I downloaded it put in my phone number but then I started to receive some creepy messages. Like people telling me they know all my information and where I live. I wouldn’t recommend downloading this app.
attributes.title: Worst

attributes.review: All I wanted.... was to support my fellow president... but when I downloaded the app😔 it said so many negative things about this man. I CANT. I need tissues. What has America come to... not to mention it took 3 months to download and all it did was tell me he’s a racist, rapist, and other things.
attributes.title: No thanks b.

attributes.review: This is the worst app I’ve ever downloaded! Completely screwed up my phone, super glitchy and keeps shutting down. I also keep hearing a weird static noise coming from my phone?? Sounds almost like a radio scanning. Deleted it immediately!!
attributes.title: Bad

attributes.review: As I went to the App Store and looked to download it many misfortunes begin to come up on me it almost took hours for it to download. I don’t know what’s wrong with that I mean I’m trying to be caught up the political climate but it is not letting me. this app really be giving me a headache.
attributes.title: Es no good amigo!!!

attributes.review: This app has so many bugs. I can’t even click on one single thing without it crashing. If this is the kind of app that the president has and it doesn’t work pristinely, it says a lot about the management. 🤬🤬
attributes.title: Awful...

attributes.review: This app took 2 weeks to download and when I opened it it got all my information and it hacked my house it’s starting playing  💕foreigner💕and so I closed the app when I opened it I was being harassed by trump voice while Kanye is masturbating in the background. ✨🦋🧚‍♂️
attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

attributes.review: It started really well but it got very laggy after a little while. I don’t understand why they would make such a great app just for it not to function well. I really want to know more about our great president 🇺🇸 but not with this app
attributes.title: Very laggy

attributes.review: I can’t wrap my head around why but as soon as this app was installed, everything else slowed down! I don’t understand why this is happening. All I wanted was to support our loving president, but I can’t keep this app in my phone if all it’s going to do is break it.
attributes.title: THIS BROKE MY INTERNET!!
